InternalServerError.title: Internal Error
InternalServerError.message: An unexpected error occurred on our servers.
InternalServerError.action: Provide the error ID to technical support.

NotFoundError.title: Not Found
NotFoundError.message: The resource you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.
NotFoundError.action: Check the URL or return to the home page.

ValidationError.title: Validation Error
ValidationError.message: The submitted data is invalid or incomplete.
ValidationError.action: Review the highlighted fields and try again.

UnauthorizedError.title: Unauthorized
UnauthorizedError.message: Your session has expired or you are not logged in.
UnauthorizedError.action: Please log in to access this area.

ForbiddenError.title: Access Denied
ForbiddenError.message: You do not have permission to perform this action.
ForbiddenError.action: Contact the administrator if you believe this is an error.

TooManyRequestsError.title: Too Many Requests
TooManyRequestsError.message: You have reached the temporary attempt limit.
TooManyRequestsError.action: Wait a few minutes before trying again.

UnprocessableEntityError.title: Invalid Operation
UnprocessableEntityError.message: The submitted instructions could not be processed.
UnprocessableEntityError.action: Check the data logic and try again.

MethodNotAllowedError.title: Method Not Allowed
MethodNotAllowedError.message: The HTTP request method used is not supported.
MethodNotAllowedError.action: Use a valid method (GET, POST, etc.).
